message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this is a very competitive price.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. That's the highest I'm willing to go at this point.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $12,000. How about we try $11,500? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
